parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the HFL module can cause battery drain, leading to no-start conditions, and potentially even a fire hazard. This can lead to safety issues, especially if the vehicle stalls while in motion.
Battery drain can cause no-start conditions, which can lead to safety issues, especially if the vehicle stalls while in motion.
Electrical system failures can cause a range of issues, including no-start conditions, stalling, and loss of electrical accessories, which can lead to safety issues.
Sensor failures can cause error codes, warning lights, and potentially even stalling or no-start conditions, which can lead to safety issues.
Windshield wiper failure can cause safety issues, especially during inclement weather.
symptoms: Windshield wipers malfunctioning or not shutting off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to shut down while driving, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: All lights on the dashboard come on
and engine lights; the vehicle loses power and will not start; the vehicle has power but will not run

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the accelerator pedal can cause the vehicle to fail to respond to throttle input, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: but the vehicle fails to respond; the vehicle responds slowly to throttle input.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the BCM can cause various electrical systems to malfunction, including door locks, windows, trunk, fuel door, and sunroof, which can lead to inconvenience and safety issues.
The premature failure of the engine oil pump can cause engine damage and lead to engine failure, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: leading to engine damage and potential engine failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission or torque converter can cause the vehicle to shudder or hesitate, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Vehicle shudders or hesitates at certain speeds (e.g.
35-45 mph); transmission does not upshift properly; vehicle RPM hangs up on deceleration to a stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, potentially resulting in fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly accelerates without input from the driver
the brake pedal is depressed but the vehicle continues to accelerate
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly while in reverse or drive gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Throttle body failure can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: the engine shuts off without warning
the vehicle experiences a sudden loss of power.
